title: Virgo Compatibility: What Sign Is Least Compatible with Virgo?

steps.title: Sagittarius.
steps.content: Sagittarius. These two are initially drawn together by intellectual or philosophical musings. However, Sagittarius is too scattered and unpredictable for Virgo's liking. Virgo finds Sagittarius to be too moody and spontaneous to be a reliable partner. Plus, Virgo takes pride in being critical so it's a tough match. [1] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. This couple’s biggest challenge: Totally different personalities. Positive aspects of this match: Virgo can provide Sagittarius with stability and practical advice while Sagittarius can keep life interesting and fun—encouraging a Virgo to travel or explore.

steps.title: Aquarius.
steps.content: Aquarius. Aquarius is an air sign that values freedom, so Virgo doesn't feel supported. There's also a real lack of romance and emotional connection although this pair has great sexual chemistry. Aquarius is a mentally-driven sign, so they're lost in their own thoughts and dreams. Virgo typically looks for someone with steadier communication skills. This couple’s biggest challenge: Poor emotional connection and different viewpoints. Positive aspects of this match: Both signs are humanitarians, but they have to work to appreciate each other's strengths—Aquarius can value Virgo's stability and follow-through while Virgo can attempt to go with the flow.

steps.title: Aries.
steps.content: Aries. This is a classic case of opposites that attract. Fiery Aries is interested in Virgo's unusually practical outlook. In fact, Aries might take it as a challenge to get Virgo to step out of their comfort zone to do something thrilling. However, when the novelty of the pair's differences wears off, Virgo will become tired of Aries's brash temperament and unpredictability. [2] X Research source This couple’s biggest challenge: Conflicting personality styles and life goals. Positive aspects of this match: Aries can help Virgo relax and enjoy life while Virgo encourages Aries to learn patience and dedication.

steps.title: Gemini.
steps.content: Gemini. Both signs are ruled by Mercury, so they're fantastic communicators. In fact, their clever banter might be what draws them together. Unfortunately, Gemini can be too flighty or impulsive for logical Virgo, who prefers stability. Virgo might even feel anxious or overwhelmed around spontaneous Gemini. [3] X Research source This couple’s biggest challenge: Gemini moves too fast in the relationship. Positive aspects of this match: Virgo can be an emotional anchor for Gemini while Gemini can help Virgo lighten up and have fun.

steps.title: Leo.
steps.content: Leo. Leo is known for their big, bold personality and energy which can overwhelm the more reserved Virgo. Virgo sees Leo's confidence as an excess of ego and it's hard for Virgo to open up around them. This relationship definitely runs hot-and-cold. This couple’s biggest challenge: Both signs are proud and stubborn. Positive aspects of this match: Leo can inspire Virgo to be more flexible and fun while Virgo can teach Leo to consider other people's feelings.

steps.title: Libra.
steps.content: Libra. This sign has potential with Virgo, but it lacks the passion to keep it going. Although Virgo appreciates Libra's diplomatic way of handling life, both signs can be too mild-mannered to spark a really great relationship, especially since Libra feels like Virgo demands too much. This couple’s biggest challenge: Keeping the relationship exciting and fulfilling. Positive aspects of this match: If both signs can see the other's viewpoint and do fun things together, this relationship could develop into a long-term one.

steps.title: Capricorn.
steps.content: Capricorn. This pairing gets along famously. They're both practical and level-headed earth signs, so they appreciate each other's efforts. Virgo might feel like Capricorn can read their mind—that's how supported they feel. It's true that they expect a lot from each other, but they both deliver! [4] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 23 December 2021. This couple's biggest strength: Mutual appreciation. Challenges to watch for: Virgo and Capricorn can become set in their ways, so the relationship can become dull if they don't make attempts to spice things up occasionally.

steps.title: Taurus.
steps.content: Taurus. This is an affectionate earth-sign relationship that totally works! While both signs are practical, Taurus is known for their sensuality. They can make Virgo feel pampered and adored while Virgo loves caring for their supportive Taurus. Virgo also appreciates Taurus's strength and stability while Taurus values Virgo's intellect. [5] X Research source This couple's biggest strength: Sensual connection and support. Challenges to watch for: Taurus can have a hard time taking Virgo's criticism and it may take both of them time to open up emotionally.

steps.title: Cancer.
steps.content: Cancer. This grounded relationship just gets better and better over time. While it might take time for these signs to open up to each other, Virgo and Cancer find that they deeply admire the other. Cancer gives unconditional love and Virgo gives companionship and a support system. This couple's biggest strength: Deep and lasting affection. Challenges to watch for: Virgo should be aware of Cancer's emotional vulnerability and offer support instead of criticism.

steps.title: Virgo.
steps.content: Virgo. Earth signs get along really well with one another, so it's no surprise that Virgo is a match with Virgo. They appreciate honesty, availability, and helpfulness in a relationship. [6] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Since they already see eye-to-eye, this creates a devoted relationship that's quite nurturing. This couple's biggest strength: Compatible worldview and life goals. Challenges to watch for: They can quickly fall into a routine where they may take each other for granted. Plus, they can nitpick each other's faults.

steps.title: Scorpio.
steps.content: Scorpio. These two experience an intense bond that stimulates a close relationship. Although both signs can be reserved or solitary, they find their strength as a couple—preferring each other's company to anyone else's. They enjoy a strong foundation that's centered on their home or relationship. [7] X Research source This couple's biggest strength: Shared emphasis on home life. Challenges to watch for: Scorpio can be too intense for Virgo and both signs can be overly critical of each other.

steps.title: Pisces.
steps.content: Pisces. This magnetic relationship is centered around health and well-being. Although Pisces is a water sign and more connected to their emotions, they love Virgo's compassion and humanitarian efforts. As a couple, they balance their differences with Virgo giving structure to the relationship while Pisces give emotional comfort. This couple's biggest strength: Nurturing and humanitarian outlook. Challenges to watch for: Pisces isn't as interested in a committed relationship as Virgo is. Virgo might ask the Pisces to be more reliable than they're able to be.
